abstract: The chief executive of the largest asset manager in the world urges his fellow C.E.O.s to stop bowing to investors. | Treasury officials are stepping in as Puerto Rico’s financial troubles mount. | A former governor of Massachusetts is said to have joined Bain Capital.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Fink Tells Chiefs to Not Be So Nice
